COURSE_TERM_REGISTRATION_FROM: Allow enrollment in the course from
COURSE_TERM_REGISTRATION_TO: Allow enrollment in the course until
COURSE_TERM_STUDENT_DELETE_CONTENT: Are you sure you want to remove the student from the course?
ERROR.COURSE_TERM.REGISTRATION_TO_IS_SMA: The registration date to is  less than the registration date from
ERROR.COURSE_TERM.ACTIVE_TO_IS_SMALLER_T: The end date is less than the course start date
ERROR.COURSE_TERM.MAXIMUM_STUDENTS_IS_LE: The maximum number of students is less than the minimum number of students
ERROR.COURSE_TERM.MAXIMUM_STUDENTS_IS_MO: The maximum number of students is greater than the capacity of the selected class
ERROR.COURSE_TERM.END_TIME_IS_LESS_THAN_: The end time is earlier than the start time
